item.description: Everyone benefits from accessibility. Accessible design improves access to information on the web for individuals with and without disabilities. Well-designed, accessible web sites expedite the delivery of information and services. Providing accessible websites and electronic documents allows a greater variety of consumers to obtain information regardless of their individual needs. ~From National DB’s accessibility toolkit This post is a part of a series.
